message.content:
{
    "quotes": [
        {
            "sentence": "Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.",
            "explanation": "This quote emphasizes the importance of mindfulness and being fully present in the current moment.",
            "author": "Buddha",
            "origin": "Teachings of the Buddha",
            "date": "6th to 4th century BCE",
            "schoolOfThought": "Buddhism",
            "category": "Mindfulness",
            "referenceUrl": "https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/101132-do-not-dwell-in-the-past-do-not-dream-of"
        },
        {
            "sentence": "The mind is everything. What you think you become.",
            "explanation": "This quote highlights the power of thoughts in shaping one's reality and being.",
            "author": "Buddha",
            "origin": "Teachings of the Buddha",
            "date": "6th to 4th century BCE",
            "schoolOfThought": "Buddhism",
            "category": "Mindfulness",
            "referenceUrl": "https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/101131-the-mind-is-everything-what-you-think-you-become"
        },
        {
            "sentence": "Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.",
            "explanation": "This quote emphasizes the idea that true peace and contentment can only be found by looking inward.",
            "author": "Buddha",
            "origin": "Teachings of the Buddha",
            "date": "6th to 4th century BCE",
            "schoolOfThought": "Buddhism",
            "category": "Mindfulness",
            "referenceUrl": "https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/101130-peace-comes-from-within-do-not-seek-it-without"
        }
    ]
}
